title: Klan
overview: The series tells the story of the multi-generational Lubicz family, whose seniors are Maria and Wladyslaw Lubicz. Maria was the owner of the family pharmacy "Pod Modrzewiem", and Wladyslaw was a juvenile court superintendent. During their more than 50 years of married life, they had five children - Elizabeth, Pawel, Monica, Dorothy and Richard - followed by a bunch of grandchildren and several great-grandchildren. Despite adversity and the surprises it cooks up for them, the inevitable conflicts, for the Lubiczes family always comes first. The siblings support each other and can always count on each other in difficult moments. The series depicts the realities of everyday life and raises important social issues.
